parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the desired arrowhead where the index begins at 0

title: INote.IGetArrowHeadAtIndex
description: Gets information on the specified arrowhead in this note.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the desired arrowhead where the index begins at 0

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This method returns an array of doubles that describe the geometry of the arrowhead on the far end of the leader line. This information is independent of whether this note actually has an arrowhead.
Format of return information is the following array of doubles:
return value[0] = arrow length (i.e. leader into arrowhead)
return value[1] = arrowhead length
return value[2] = arrowhead width
